extendedInfo.description: Bug Chucker is a bugged-out, fun physics artillery game with a whole different galactic gravitational perspective. It's an easy game to learn and a blast to master. (From Cyan Worlds: the makers of Myst & Riven.)âââââ Addictive!!! (Apdisastr)âââââ I LOVE THIS SWEET GAME! (SD)âââââ I love this game! I can't stop playing!! (GM)âââââ Fantastic! (Sprixy)âââââ This game is amazing! (Squirtbert)âââââ Love it! Challenging and engaging. (DD)âââââ Better than the birds. (Mystess)âââââ Love the game. Great app... (KD)The Galactic Bugship S.S. Treehugger, honored bastion and conveyor of the Great Tree, is under attack by the evil Sawz, the robotic minions of Lord Lahguh. Your mission is to help the dutiful bugs save their ship and preserve its precious cargo by ridding the universe of the Sawz, one galaxy at a time. Ready... aim... chuck!Feel the buzz!Each galaxy in Bug Chucker has loads of levels. (The first galaxy has 42 - don't forget your towel!) And each level presents a whole new way to look at a solar system. Sometimes you just need to blast through some space debris to get to the Sawz. Other times itâs a bit trickier - as the Sawz shield themselves behind fence-fields, tuck themselves cleverly behind a moon, or plan their attack on the far side of a few planets, suns or even black holes. Donât underestimate the gravity of the situation, or you might just find yourself in orbit.Features: â¢ Forty-two initial levels in the first galaxy with more on the way. â¢ Graphics, physics, and gravity of astronomical proportions. â¢ Start chucking the Ladybug and move up to the Beetle, the Grasshopper, and the Mosquito - each with their own special skill. And more bugs are waiting in the wings. â¢ Three stars of achievement in each level - and if you can manage higher scores (good luck), youâll further âshineâ your stars. â¢ Exclusive âleft-handâ mode that allows the device to be flipped to make playing easier for lefties. â¢ Unique dynamic scoring that lets the points roll in until you decide the level is over. â¢ Trouble with a level? You're allowed two skips, so you don't get stuck.

reviews.comment: Good attention to detail, love how the gravity affects everything; not just the bugs
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for.
reviews.comment: Got excited when I saw it was from Cyan worlds but it\'s just another boring object launcher. C\'mon Cyan, give us some worlds to explore!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this game and it works great on the droid charge. On 1-17 hit the stack of blocks to get them to fall then make the blocks hit the bombs
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Interesting Twist
reviews.comment: Pretty cool game. Having to use the gravity wells to aim your bug makes it different. And since I drive a New Beetle, it fits me. I\'m using an Acer A500 16GB. Don\'t upgrade. The update includes BIG ads. I\'ve removed it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: In-app ad removal doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I removed ads with noon refundable, in-app purchase, but ads are still blocking the screen in the game. Lame
reviews.author: Jason Miller

reviews.title: An amazing game from an amazing company.
reviews.comment: Cyan\'s attention to detail makes for an awesome game. Glad to see these people back in the market, they\'ve made a difficult and rewarding game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice game, works great on Acer A500
reviews.comment: Let\'s hope we\'ll get Myst games on market as well
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game.
reviews.comment: It just got copied by Rovio with their angry space birds. Shows how innovative this game was.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun, creative game. Caused lockup 3 x on htc evo4g needed to pull battery to clear each time!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on my SGS2. Force exits after pressing play or options.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great graphics, great concept but the lagging sucks. Motorola defy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fantastic game! Very challenging!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game! This is one of my new favorites. Now, could someone tell me how to do level 1-17?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game!! Highly recommend!! Progressive challenges keep things interesting. Congrats to Cyan Worlds!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A great Cyan game
reviews.comment: Very fun and like a lot of their products chellenging
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nice but buggy.
reviews.comment: the level select screen is a bit buggy but over all a great app. now hurry up Cyan and port Myst to android.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love the concept and the art
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: It\'s an OK game, good attention to detail, but basically angry birds space. Also, when is Myst and Riven coming to android??
reviews.author: Caleb Gardner

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Really fun and original. Working good on my Atrix.
reviews.author: A Google User
